conversations.content: Happy Days on the Roost: Part One
X Month, O Day Physical condition: Extremely good. Walked around Yuyugi Park. Two laps. Aurelius's son came along. How kind he is.
X Month, X Day Physical Condition: Decent, I guess? Brunhilda came to play. She's matured, but she wanted to pretend to be a ＂magic girl＂ and kept bugging me to be the villain...
X Month, Y Day Physical Condition: Generally good. Every time this young lad named Luca hits a home run, he breaks windows on nearby houses. What a swing he's got!
Happy Days on the Roost: Part Two
Z Month, O Day Physical Condition: Not bad. I'll tell Poseidon about the acupressure points that relieve lower back pain...
Z Month, Z Day Physical Condition: Flawless I saw Siren for the first time. What a party! I swung my glowstick around in the air like my life depended on it.
Z Month, X Day Physical Condition: Surprisingly good. Took a walk in Yuyugi Park alone today, on a path I trod long ago with Aurelius. And that day, he said...
